name: Cursor
description: An AI-powered code editor that maximizes productivity through intelligent code suggestions and natural language editing.
introduction:
## Tool Introduction

Developed by Anysphere, Cursor is a groundbreaking AI-powered code editor that feels intuitive yet supercharges your workflow. It accurately anticipates your coding needs, providing intelligent suggestions and multi-line code completions with a simple tab, allowing you to breeze through changes effortlessly.

## Key Features

- Tab auto-completion predicts your next edit based on context
- Natural language editing to update classes or functions with simple prompts
- Built-in assistant to fetch code snippets, explain logic, or fix bugs from your codebase
- Customizable to import your preferred extensions, themes, and keybindings

## Ideal Use Cases

- Accelerating development for solo developers or teams
- Boosting coding productivity across all languages and frameworks
- Seamlessly integrating AI assistance into your familiar coding environment

## Getting Started

1. Download Cursor for your operating system
2. Create an account and optionally sync settings from your current editor
3. Open a project, and start coding with AI-powered completions and assistance

## User Feedback

- "Cursor is hands down my biggest workflow improvement in years" - Sawyer Hood, Figma
- "There is no going back after using Cursor's incredible AI editing capabilities" - Johannes Schickling, Prisma

## Praised Features

- Familiarity and ease of transitioning from traditional code editors
- Accurate and time-saving code predictions
- Powerful multi-line editing capabilities with natural language prompts

## Potential Drawbacks

- Intermittent lags or freezes reported during heavy AI processing
- Limited documentation or learning resources for advanced usage
